amendment.description: To require a report on plans for the use and availability of airfields in the United States for homeland defense missions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1733 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1733 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Stabenow to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S3912-3915; text: CR S3914-3915) To require a report on plans for the use and availability of airfields in the United States for homeland defense missions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1733 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1733 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Stabenow to Amendment SA 1463.
